divs: Sighting Detailspaw paw lake faceing east,dark out noticed a bright white light 500 ft away,300 ft up,want out with video cam,light not moveing,then see a second light,very fant,go from south to north,fly under first light very slow.then first ligt moves toward me to west.then see a flashing white light,on left and right,on craft.other fant light on north side of lake.then first light all most over me,i see a strobe,light and here a motor,realize it was just two planes,or was it,go inside.at 8:40 i see two blue lights,to the east not moveing, go out side.cant here any thing,then lights move towards me to west,i here two helicopters,then see a white light with the blue light,no strobe light,on helicopters. then one takes off,extremely fast,next helicopter follows,they head west,had to be military,folllowing the craft west,very x-files like,maybe not planes....
Summary: saw white lights,not moveing, then ,military helicopters show up.
trends: There has been one other sighting in Watervliet
There were no other sightings in Watervliet on or around October 21st 2009
